title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.1 - Payment of toll required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.1 - Payment of toll required

State Regulations

No vehicle or pedestrian shall cross the bridges without the
payment of the toll prescribed by the commission at the regularly established
places for the collection of such toll. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
654.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
